system.descriptionText: Add +4 Armour to all faces. Reduce Tactical and Cruising Speed by 5 Metres and Reduce Manoeuvrability by -10. Any Critical Damage, including that from Righteous Fury to a location with Ablative Armour destroys it, but causes no other Critical Effect. Can't be repaired, must be replaced.
